item.title: CVE-2024-21840|2024-01-30T02:08:34.752Z -- Hitachi -- Hitachi Storage Plug-in for VMware vCenter
item.description:
Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in Hitachi Storage Plug-in for VMware vCenter allowsÂ local users to read and write specific files.
This issue affects Hitachi Storage Plug-in for VMware vCenter: from 04.0.0 through 04.9.2.
